Text: To fullscreen game, once dosbox is installed go to dosbox- options, then where it have fullscreen=false change to fullscreen=true. Note alt-enter to exit fullscreen.
See http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6824180 for a second helping!!!
Any problems with any of the above, write a comment (you have to be registered) and I'll write back. Be descriptive and direct about the problem for best answers.
